tool_description: Executes cleanup plans by performing actual deletion and archival operations with progress tracking, rollback capabilities, and comprehensive logging.

plan_id.description: ID of the cleanup plan to execute

confirm_execution.description: Explicit confirmation required to proceed with deletion operations

dry_run.description: Perform dry run without actual deletions

error_messages: Plan not found: The specified plan_id does not exist or has been deleted.
Execution not confirmed: Set confirm_execution=true to proceed with actual cleanup operations.
Plan already executing: This cleanup plan is currently being executed by another process.
Insufficient permissions: Some operations cannot be completed due to file system permissions.
usage: Provide plan_id and set confirm_execution=true to execute cleanup operations. Use dry_run=true to test execution without making actual changes.

execution_id.description: Unique identifier for this execution instance

operations_completed.description: Number of cleanup operations successfully completed

operations_failed.description: Number of operations that failed during execution

space_freed_gb.description: Total storage space freed in gigabytes

execution_log.description: Detailed log entries from the execution process

execution_summary.description: Executive summary of cleanup execution results and any issues encountered
